content.raw:
## Pros

* allows c++17 features in ign-plugin

## Cons

* breaks xenial support

## Analysis

I think ign-plugin currently is fully working with gz11 without this change since it can find `ign-cmake2` if `ign-cmake1` is not found. So I don't think this is strictly necessary, but we should decide if we want to support this package on xenial, which is still an LTS, or if we would rather have c++17.

cc @mxgrey
